[[Killer B]] jumps into the air with his [[Kumogakure swords|seven swords]] and tackles the opponent whilst coated in lightning chakra.

== Trivia ==
* As with many of the techniques of [[Kumogakure]] ninja, this technique has an English name given kanji that somewhat matches the pronunciation.

[[pl:Raitoningu Baruto]]
